thread.title: Here's what happened when I told Julio Jones he played for the Patriots
thread.title_full: Here's what happened when I told Julio Jones he played for the Patriots

author: Joseph Goodman | jgoodman@al.com
title: Here's what happened when I told Julio Jones he played for the Patriots
text: Sometimes you misspeak, and sometimes you misspeak so badly you want to crawl into a cave of shame and cry and pull your hair out and binge eat rocky road ice cream and heavily sedate yourself with a tranquilizer gun designed for elephants. It happened to me on Wednesday, but what happened
